message:
The following status has been taken from the FB ID of Advocate Shishir Mohammad Monir, one of the member of the defense lawyers of the accused Jamaat leaders>>

Today we have completed first part of our submission in relation to Professor Azam's case. Insha Allah Barrister Abdur Razzaq will commence submission on Wednesday on the following points:
1. Elements of crimes under 1973 Act and customary international law.
2. Formation, purpose and functions of peace committee
3. Auxiliary forces ( Razakar, Al-Badr, Al-Shams)
4. Interpretation of the words miscreants and Indian infiltrators.
5. Detail arguments on conspiracy, planning, incitement and complicity.
6. Indian aggression
We expect all of these above arguments will be eye opening for judges and prosecutors. They certainly will not accept our arguments but we hope we will be able to show our honesty and wisdom. Let's work together for a better tomorrow.
